scripts.update:NodeTemplate: npm update dom-node-template && rm -rf ./src/core/NodeTemplate && mkdir -p ./src/core/NodeTemplate && cp -R ./node_modules/dom-node-template/src/* ./src/core/NodeTemplate/
scripts.update:Observable: npm update literal-observer && rm -rf ./src/core/Observable && mkdir -p ./src/core/Observable && cp -R ./node_modules/literal-observer/src/* ./src/core/Observable/
scripts.update:core: npm run update:NodeTemplate && npm run update:Observable
scripts.babel: npm run update:core && npm install -d && babel --out-dir ./dist ./src
scripts.build:es5: npm run babelrc:es5 && npm run babel
scripts.build:es6: npm run babelrc:es6 && npm run babel
scripts.build:webpack: npm run update:core && npm run babelrc:es5 && npm install -d && webpack --mode=production
scripts.build:all: npm run build:webpack && npm run build:es6
